articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: This new class of hot ocean worlds could support life - CNN
articles.description: Astronomers have a new class of habitable exoplanets to look for: Hycean planets. These hot ocean worlds are more prevalent across the galaxy and a promising place to search for life outside of our solar system.
